tracks.text: Greg Davies, the Taskmaster, types at a typewriter. Scenes from the show play, depicting the 5 contestants with absurd situations, costumes, and reactions.
A toy cat is taped to the top of a door frame. Text appears. Jumungo.
He gets on hands and feet and dog walks forward
Greg frowns and places a hand on Alex's arm
Greg purses his lips
The nose is the robot's head, the cheeks are arms, the eyes are hands, the eyebrows are the crab shell, and the horns are the crabs legs
An african drum called a djembe
A halloween decoration

In black and white, bats cling to a grated ceiling at the bottom of the screen. They open their cape like wings and flex. One bat kicks another bat. Several bats, wrapped up in wings, look intensely at the camera while eating.
Steve pats Sophie's knee

A dome made of large panels sits next to the Taskmaster house. Some panels are missing: 2 on the side, and 1 at the top. The bottom of the dome is covered in various stuffed animals. On the door of the dome is a sign showing an orange stuffed cat. It says MISSING Rescue the cat. Next to the door is a long stick covered in foam with a boxing glove at the end.
Patatas is nestled amongst teddy bears.
Alex shakes his head and looks down
Steve grabs the pole
She sits on the top
She falls off
It bounces off the ceiling and lands on the other side of the dome.
She takes a leaf blower to the other side of the dome
The cat's fur moves, but not the cat
He hooks the cat
He gets the cat out of the top panel
She pulls the cat to the side of the dome, reaches in, and picks up the cat.
She swings the cat by a noose
She climbs a ladder next to the dome, tosses the cat through the top hole, then pulls the rope. Alex holds the ladder.
It catches, she tugs, and the cat pops out the top hole
Eyes wide, lips apart, pointing forward, cat upside down
Standing on a step ladder, Sophie tosses the fishing line into the top of the dome
Her hook slides off Patatas
Nick's magnet, duck taped to the end of a chain, catches on Patatas's hook
Nick pulls the chain, and Patatas drops
Nick grabs Patatas from a side window, tosses it through the top opening. The stuffed animal flies up high and bounces off of the roof.
Sophie has Patatas hooked to a bungee cord. As she pulls him through the top hole, he flies towards her, hitting her abdomen.
As Nick walks away, he tosses Patatas over his shoulder.
John looks at the end of the stick and begins to detach the foam.
He finds a claw hook
He easily grabs Patatas's head
And manuevers it out top window.
He drops it, and Patatas falls to the ground
John walks away with it
Distorted and hazy shots of the Taskmaster house
Alex's head floats over with a task
Alex stands on the front steps in an all-green onesey
Steve puts the task in Alex's mouth
Alex's body disappears
Steve taps his hands on a table in the Study
In the kitchen, the fridge door opens
Milk and eggs float out
An egg cracks and milk is poured in a large bowl
Steve pats his belly
A spoon of flower floats to the bowl
The barely mixed ingredients are poured into a skillet
The skillet floats up and flips the pancake
The skillet turns upright, gently placing a pancake on a plate
Steve turns, and a plate and small bowl float through the door
Steve smiles
He grabs the bowl, full of white powder
He dusts powder on the pancake, and picks up utensils that fell from the plate
He cuts into it, and takes a bite
He turns to the empty air and offers a bite
Nick's mouth and nose appear, and Steve feeds him a bite
Steve smiles and gestures with his fork. From above, we see Nick in a green onesey with green tape over his face, sitting next to Steve.
A plastic lizard lands on her shoulder
She licks the lizard. Our view becomes hazy.
She stands. An hourglass and other objects float by.
She leaps right, and lands on John in a blue onesey
Joanne, in a blue onesie, pushes Sophie onto John's back and holds her feet
Sophie holds her arms arm at she appears to fly, while footless.
The outlines of John's feet can be seen in her shadow

In the lab, objects sit on a shelf, including honey, toilet paper, velcro tape, bowls of toffee and white powders, a caulking gun, scotch tape, blue tack, hair gel, and bottles of light colored fluids.
On a table, spatulas and spoons sit in a jar next to a cutting board, a kitchen scale, and mixing bowl. The tasks is stuck to a nearby whiteboard behind the table.
A black marmite jar sits next to scotch tape
He holds a vase and a Statue of David figurine in each hand
Joanne weighs a baby head, a rubber ducky, and a fish purse
Joanne tapes velcro to white board and presses the fish on it
Nick uses the silicon gun to mix silicon with styling gel
There's 3 inches of scotch tape
Nick places velcro on the board
He takes his sock off and places it over the 1 litre water bottle
The sock doesn't care about the velcro
Steve tries to tape David's arm to the board.
Joanne's fish stays on the velcro
Steve adds a piece of toffee to 12 pieces of blue tack
He presses David against the blue tack, but it does nothing.
Nick spatulas his styling gel and silicon mixture onto his sock covered water bottle.
The gel drops to the ground
The fish is still on the wall with 12 seconds to go
Nick takes the water bottle out of the sock
Nick puts the sock against the velcro
He looks at the goo covered sock. His left foot is bare.
David drops
A decoration in the Taskmaster house hallway
Blue tack
She feeds the velcro into the wall mount hook on the star
She perches it on the top of the board
She adds more tape to the star
John's board falls after 29 seconds
He mixes honey and flour in a bowl
He touches the batter
Sophie has lined her star and board with decorative toffees
John watches the cutting board stuck to the white board
It lasted 19 seconds
Sophie dances slightly    in her chair.
Joanne 15, Sophie 12, John 12
Sophie 17, John 17
Credits roll while Steve walks to the prizes
Steve picks up a plate with a hand shaped bowl. Sophie beams. Steve turns the bowl over and the pudding, a ball like pastry, falls out.
He turns the bull mascot over. He tosses the flowers out of the upturned djembe and starts playing the drum.
He proudly shows off the upturned bull and calculator while nodding. He takes a bow.
